body.p: The WebHelp Classic variant is designed for desktop systems when feedback from users is not necessary and it is available for DocBook. The WebHelp Classic with Feedback variant also includes a feedback system that allows your users to make comments and allows you to manage and reply to them. This section contains information about configuring a WebHelp Classic system and customizing the output.

This type of WebHelp system can be generated by using one of the following transformation scenarios:
DocBook WebHelp Classic transformation scenario.
DocBook WebHelp Classic with Feedback transformation scenario.
